root.name: Touhou 13 Ten Desires
root.description: Touhou 13 Ten Desires is the 13th game in ZUN's long running Touhou Project series. It stars Marisa, Reimu, Sanae and Youmu as the four playable characters this time around.It incorporates some of the features used in Touhou 12.8 Fairy Wars such as switching Youmu's focus with a charge attack, making her status as a trained swordsman make more sense by adding in short range, powerful slice attacks in conjunction with her long range danmaku.The addition of Youmu as opposed to Sakuya was a bit polarizing amongst Touhou fans, making some sad and some happy, depending on who you speak to.Playable CharactersReimu HakureiMarisa KirisameSanae KochiyaYoumu KonpakuEnemiesStageBossStage 1 Mid-bossNameless Mid-boss Divine SpiritStage 1 BossYuyuko SaigyoujiStage 2 Mid-bossKasodani KyoukoStage 2 BossKasodani KyoukoStage 3 Mid-bossKogasa TataraStage 3 BossMiyako YoshikaStage 4 Mid-bossSeiga KakuStage 4 BossSeiga KakuStage 5 Mid-bossSoga no TojikoStage 5 BossMononobe no FutoStage 6 BossToyosatomimi no MikoExtra Stage Mid-bossNue HoujuuExtra Stage BossMamizou Futatsuiwa
